A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can see why many didn’t like this film\, but it’s such an improvement over The Force Awakens. It’s not perfect: there’s an over abundance of silliness which I guess I have to expect from Disney movies now. As TFA was a rip-off of a New Hope this one almost tries to fake us out on every point. One plot line which was mostly a waste of time and the film could have benefited from trimming.
